original: bde bar dang / mtho bar dang / mngon par dang / so sor dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid bya'o //
analyzed: bde bar dang / mtho bar dang / mngon par dang / so sor dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid bya'o //

analyzed: yongs su dang / nye bar dag gis kyang mtshan nyid tsam mo //

original: nye bar sgyur ba nyi shu pa de rnams kyi mdo'i 'grel pa mngon par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: nye bar sgyur ba nyi shu pa de rnams kyi mdo'i 'grel pa mngon par brjod par bya ste /
translated: The commentary on the s≈´tra of those twenty types of affix will be expressed.

original: rab ni las dang po pa dang / stobs rgyal dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / mnga' bdag sbyin dang / 'byung ba dang / sbyor ba dang / 'bral ba dang / tshim pa dang / gtsang ba dang / 'dod pa dang / nus pa dang /
analyzed: rab ni las dang po pa dang / stobs rgyal dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / mnga' bdag sbyin dang / 'byung ba dang / sbyor ba dang / 'bral ba dang / tshim pa dang / gtsang ba dang / 'dod pa dang / nus pa dang /
translated: The best is for beginners, for the powerful, for the sound of generosity, for the lord of generosity, for the source, for the application, for the separation, for the satisfaction, for the pure, for the desire, for the ability,

original: zhi ba dang / mchod pa dang / mchog dang / lta ba rnams so //
analyzed: zhi ba dang / mchod pa dang / mchog dang / lta ba rnams so //
translated: for the peace, for the worship, for the supreme, and for the views.

original: rab ces bya ba'i sgra ni don bco lnga po de rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: rab ces bya ba'i sgra ni don bco lnga po de rnams la 'jug go //
translated: The word ‚Äúbest‚Äù applies to these fifteen meanings.

original: las dang po pa la rab tu las dang po pa dang / stobs rgyal la rab tu stobs rgyal dang / sbyin pa'i sgra la rab tu sbyin pa'i sgra dang / mnga' bdag sbyin la rab tu mnga' bdag sbyin dang / 'byung ba la gangs can las gang g'a rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: las dang po pa la rab tu las dang po pa dang / stobs rgyal la rab tu stobs rgyal dang / sbyin pa'i sgra la rab tu sbyin pa'i sgra dang / mnga' bdag sbyin la rab tu mnga' bdag sbyin dang / 'byung ba la gangs can las gang g'a rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: For beginners, it is the best for beginners; for the powerful, it is the best for the powerful; for the sound of generosity, it is the best for the sound of generosity; for the lord of generosity, it is the best for the lord of generosity; for the source, it is the best for the source from which the Ganges arises;

original: sbyor ba la rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'bral ba la rab tu 'bral ba dang / tshim pa la rab tu tshim pa dang / gtsang ba la rab tu gtsang ba'i chu dang / 'dod pa la rab tu 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / nus pa la rab tu nus pa dang /
analyzed: sbyor ba la rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'bral ba la rab tu 'bral ba dang / tshim pa la rab tu tshim pa dang / gtsang ba la rab tu gtsang ba'i chu dang / 'dod pa la rab tu 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / nus pa la rab tu nus pa dang /
translated: The supreme of waters is that which is applied to the supreme of applications, that which is separated from the supreme of separations, that which is satisfied with the supreme of satisfactions, that which is purified by the supreme of purifications, that which is desired by the supreme of desires, that which is able by the supreme of abilities,

original: zhi ba la rab tu zhi ba dang / mchod pa la rab tu mchod pa'i me dang / mchog la rab tu sbom pa'i shing mchog dang / lta ba la rab tu lta ba'o //
analyzed: zhi ba la rab tu zhi ba dang / mchod pa la rab tu mchod pa'i me dang / mchog la rab tu sbom pa'i shing mchog dang / lta ba la rab tu lta ba'o //
translated: that which is pacified by the supreme of pacifications, that which is worshipped by the supreme of worships, that which is the supreme of the supreme of trees, and that which is seen by the supreme of views.

original: mchog ni gsod pa dang / byi dor dang / gshegs pa dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyal ba dang / gtso bo dang / mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: mchog ni gsod pa dang / byi dor dang / gshegs pa dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyal ba dang / gtso bo dang / mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa rnams la'o //
translated: The supreme is in killing, adorning, going, conquering, increasing, winning, being chief, being in accord, and being in discord.

original: mchog ces pa'i nye bar sgyur pa ni don dgu po de rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: mchog ces pa'i nye bar sgyur pa ni don dgu po de rnams la 'jug go //
translated: The suffix -ma is used for these nine meanings.

original: gsod pa la mchog tu gsod pa dang / byi dor la mchog tu bying dor dang / gshegs pa la mchog tu gshegs pa dang / rnam par gnon pa la mchog tu gnon pa dang / 'phel ba la mchog tu 'phel ba dang / rgyal ba mchog tu rgyal ba dang /
analyzed: gsod pa la mchog tu gsod pa dang / byi dor la mchog tu bying dor dang / gshegs pa la mchog tu gshegs pa dang / rnam par gnon pa la mchog tu gnon pa dang / 'phel ba la mchog tu 'phel ba dang / rgyal ba mchog tu rgyal ba dang /
translated: The superlative of killing is supreme killing, the superlative of cleaning is supreme cleaning, the superlative of going is supreme going, the superlative of subduing is supreme subduing, the superlative of increasing is supreme increasing, the superlative of victory is supreme victory,

original: gtso bo la mchog tu gtso bo dang / mthun pa la mchog tu mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa la mchog tu mi @31a * //
analyzed: gtso bo la mchog tu gtso bo dang / mthun pa la mchog tu mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa la mchog tu mi @31a * //
translated: the superlative of chief is supreme chief, the superlative of agreeable is supreme agreeable, and the superlative of disagreeable is supreme disagreeable.

original: mthun pa'o // lhag par ni char 'bab pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'phrog pa dang / dgyes pa dang / ston pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang / sdig sbrul dang / rtogs pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: mthun pa'o // lhag par ni char 'bab pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'phrog pa dang / dgyes pa dang / ston pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang / sdig sbrul dang / rtogs pa rnams la'o //
translated: The superlative is used for rain, throwing, snatching, delight, teaching, transformation, snake, and realization.

original: lhag par zhes pa'i nye bar sgyur ba ni don brgyad po de rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: lhag par zhes pa'i nye bar sgyur ba ni don brgyad po de rnams la 'jug go //
translated: The superlative affix is used for these eight meanings.

original: char 'bab pa la lhag par grong khyer gnas bcas nas char 'bab pa dang / 'phen pa lhag par 'phen pa dang / 'phrog pa la lhag par 'phrog pa dang / dgyes pa la lhag par dgyes pa dang / ston pa la lhag par ston pa dang /
analyzed: char 'bab pa la lhag par grong khyer gnas bcas nas char 'bab pa dang / 'phen pa lhag par 'phen pa dang / 'phrog pa la lhag par 'phrog pa dang / dgyes pa la lhag par dgyes pa dang / ston pa la lhag par ston pa dang /
translated: It rains more in the city of VƒÅrƒÅ·πáasƒ´ than elsewhere, it rains more when it is thrown more, it rains more when it is stolen more, it rains more when it is enjoyed more, it rains more when it is taught more, and it rains more when it is dedicated more.üîΩ

original: rnam par 'gyur ba la lhag par rnam par 'gyur ba dang / sdig sbrul la lhag par sdig sbrul las dang / rtogs pa la lhag par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba la lhag par rnam par 'gyur ba dang / sdig sbrul la lhag par sdig sbrul las dang / rtogs pa la lhag par rtogs pa'o //
translated: The rain falls in excess in the city of VƒÅrƒÅ·πáasƒ´, the throwing of the dice is in excess in the city of MathurƒÅ, the stealing is in excess in the city of ≈öƒÅkala, the sexual misconduct is in excess in the city of Kau≈õƒÅmbƒ´, the lying is in excess in the city of Ujjayinƒ´, the slander is in excess in the city of MƒÅlava, the harsh speech is in excess in the city of ≈örƒÅvastƒ´, the frivolous speech is in excess in the city of AyodhyƒÅ, the covetousness is in excess in the city of SthƒÅne≈õvara, the ill will is in excess in the city of KƒÅnyakubja, the false view is in excess in the city of Pataliputra, the killing is in excess in the city of Tak·π£a≈õilƒÅ, and the pride is in excess in the city of MathurƒÅ.

original: yang dag par ni sbyor ba dang / rigs pa dang / gsong por smra ba dang / skye ba dang / bden pa dang / byed pa dang / bkram pa dang / brgyan pa dang / mngon du phyogs pa dang / dor ba dang / grub pa dang /üîΩsdang ba dang / 'dzin pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: yang dag par ni sbyor ba dang / rigs pa dang / gsong por smra ba dang / skye ba dang / bden pa dang / byed pa dang / bkram pa dang / brgyan pa dang / mngon du phyogs pa dang / dor ba dang / grub pa dang / sdang ba dang / 'dzin pa rnams la'o //
translated: The prefix sam in samyak means the following thirteen meanings: connection, propriety, frankness, birth, truth, action, expansion, ornament, facing, discarding, accomplishment, hostility, and grasping.

original: yang dag ces pa'i nye bar sgyur ba ni don bcu gsum po de rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: yang dag ces pa'i nye bar sgyur ba ni don bcu gsum po de rnams la 'jug go //
translated: The prefix sam in samyak is used for these thirteen meanings.

original: sbyor ba la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / rigs pa la yang dag par rigs pa dang / gsong por smra ba la yang dag par gsong por smra ba dang / skye ba la yang dag par skye ba dang / bden pa la yang dag par bden pa dang /
analyzed: sbyor ba la yang dag par sbyor ba dang / rigs pa la yang dag par rigs pa dang / gsong por smra ba la yang dag par gsong por smra ba dang / skye ba la yang dag par skye ba dang / bden pa la yang dag par bden pa dang /
translated: correct truth with regard to truth,üîΩcorrect action with regard to action,üîΩcorrect expansion with regard to expansion,üîΩcorrect adornment with regard to adornment,üîΩcorrect orientation with regard to orientation,

original: byed pa la yang dag par byed pa dang / bkram pa la yang dag par bkram pa dang / brgyan pa la yang dag par brgyan pa dang / mngon du phyogs pa la yang dag par mngon du phyogs pa dang / dor ba la yang dag par dor ba dang /
analyzed: byed pa la yang dag par byed pa dang / bkram pa la yang dag par bkram pa dang / brgyan pa la yang dag par brgyan pa dang / mngon du phyogs pa la yang dag par mngon du phyogs pa dang / dor ba la yang dag par dor ba dang /
translated: correct rejection with regard to rejection,üîΩcorrect accomplishment with regard to accomplishment,

original: grub pa la yang dag par grub pa dang / sdang ba la yang dag par sdang ba dang / 'dzin pa la yang dag par 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa la yang dag par grub pa dang / sdang ba la yang dag par sdang ba dang / 'dzin pa la yang dag par 'dzin pa'o //
translated: correct hostility with regard to hostility, andüîΩcorrect grasping with regard to grasping.

original: rjes su ni gnas dang / nye ba dang / kha dog dang / 'brel pa dang / gnang nas 'gro ba dang / mtshungs pa dang / mngon par mtho ba dang / mtshon pa dang / dman pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: rjes su ni gnas dang / nye ba dang / kha dog dang / 'brel pa dang / gnang nas 'gro ba dang / mtshungs pa dang / mngon par mtho ba dang / mtshon pa dang / dman pa rnams la'o //
translated: The suffix is used for nine meanings: place, proximity, color, connection, permission, going, equality, higher status, indication, and inferiority.

original: rjes su zhes pa'i nye bar sgyur ba ni don dgu po de rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: rjes su zhes pa'i nye bar sgyur ba ni don dgu po de rnams la 'jug go //
translated: The suffix is used for those nine meanings.

original: gnas la rjes su grong khyer p'a ta li pu trar gnas dang / nye ba la rjes su sprin ni gang g'a la nye ba dang / kha dog la rjes su kha dog gdon pa dang / 'brel pa la rjes su 'brel pa dang / gnang nas 'gro ba la rjes su gnang nas 'gro ba dang /
analyzed: gnas la rjes su grong khyer p'a ta li pu trar gnas dang / nye ba la rjes su sprin ni gang g'a la nye ba dang / kha dog la rjes su kha dog gdon pa dang / 'brel pa la rjes su 'brel pa dang / gnang nas 'gro ba la rjes su gnang nas 'gro ba dang /
translated: For place, it is used as in ‚Äúafter the city of PƒÅ·π≠aliputra,‚Äù for proximity, as in ‚Äúafter the clouds on the Ganges,‚Äù for color, as in ‚Äúafter the color of the sky,‚Äù for connection, as in ‚Äúafter the connection,‚Äù for permission, as in ‚Äúafter permission to go,‚Äù

original: mtshungs pa la rjes su mtshungs pa dang / mngon par mtho ba la rjes su mngon par mtho ba dang / mtshon pa la rjes su mtshon pa dang / dman pa la rjes @31b su dman pa nags kyi spos 'tshong ba'o //
analyzed: mtshungs pa la rjes su mtshungs pa dang / mngon par mtho ba la rjes su mngon par mtho ba dang / mtshon pa la rjes su mtshon pa dang / dman pa la rjes @31b su dman pa nags kyi spos 'tshong ba'o //
translated: for equality, as in ‚Äúafter equality,‚Äù for higher status, as in ‚Äúafter higher status,‚Äù for indication, as in ‚Äúafter indication,‚Äù and for inferiority, as in ‚Äúafter the inferior incense seller in the forest.‚Äù

original: phul du ni shes pa dang / dmigs pa dang / byang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / khyab pa dang / dga' ba dang / grol ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: phul du ni shes pa dang / dmigs pa dang / byang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / khyab pa dang / dga' ba dang / grol ba rnams la'o //
translated: The highest degree of knowledge, the highest degree of object, the highest degree of purification, the highest degree of attainment, the highest degree of pervasiveness, the highest degree of delight, and the highest degree of liberation.

original: phul du zhes pa'i nye bar sgyur ba ni don bdun po de rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: phul du zhes pa'i nye bar sgyur ba ni don bdun po de rnams la 'jug go //
translated: The prefix parama- is used in the sense of these seven topics.

original: shes pa la phul du shes pa dang / dmigs pa la phul du dmigs pa dang / byang ba la phul du byang ba dang / rnyed pa la phul du rnyed pa dang / khyab pa la phul du khyab pa dang / dga' ba la phul du dga' ba dang /üîΩgrong ba la phul du grol ba'o //üîΩbral ba ni sbyor ba dang / lugs dang / sgyu dang / tri ma dang / nges pa dang / phyogs dang / rim pa dang / khyad par rnams la'o //
analyzed: shes pa la phul du shes pa dang / dmigs pa la phul du dmigs pa dang / byang ba la phul du byang ba dang / rnyed pa la phul du rnyed pa dang / khyab pa la phul du khyab pa dang / dga' ba la phul du dga' ba dang / grong ba la phul du grol ba'o // bral ba ni sbyor ba dang / lugs dang / sgyu dang / tri ma dang / nges pa dang / phyogs dang / rim pa dang / khyad par rnams la'o //
translated: The highest degree of knowledge, the highest degree of object, the highest degree of purification, the highest degree of attainment, the highest degree of pervasiveness, the highest degree of delight, and the highest degree of liberation.

original: bral ba zhes pa'i sgra ni don brgyad po de rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: bral ba zhes pa'i sgra ni don brgyad po de rnams la 'jug go //
translated: The prefix vi- is used in the sense of these eight topics.

original: sbyor ba la sbyor bral dang / lugs la lugs bral dang / sgyu la sgyu bral dang / dri ma la dri bral dang / nges pa la nges bral dang / phyogs la phyogs bral dang / rim pa la rim bral dang / khyad par la khyad par dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba la sbyor bral dang / lugs la lugs bral dang / sgyu la sgyu bral dang / dri ma la dri bral dang / nges pa la nges bral dang / phyogs la phyogs bral dang / rim pa la rim bral dang / khyad par la khyad par dang bral ba'o //
translated: Application is free from application, system is free from system, deception is free from deception, defilement is free from defilement, determination is free from determination, position is free from position, stage is free from stage, and distinction is free from distinction.

original: ngan pa ni bzung ba dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / 'gro ba dang / thob pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: ngan pa ni bzung ba dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / 'gro ba dang / thob pa rnams la'o //
translated: Bad is in regard to grasping, strength, color, going, and attainment.

original: ngan pa zhes pa'i nye bar sgyur ba'i don lnga po de rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: ngan pa zhes pa'i nye bar sgyur ba'i don lnga po de rnams la 'jug go //
translated: The five objects of the preposition bad are those five.

original: bzung la bzung ba ngan pa dang / stobs la stobs ngan pa dang / kha dog la kha dog ngan pa dang / 'gro ba la ngan 'gro dang / thob pa la ngan pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: bzung la bzung ba ngan pa dang / stobs la stobs ngan pa dang / kha dog la kha dog ngan pa dang / 'gro ba la ngan 'gro dang / thob pa la ngan pa thob pa'o //
translated: Bad grasping, bad strength, bad color, bad going, and bad attainment.

original: rnam par ni sna tshogs pa dang / sbyor ba dang / gtor ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / ring ba dang / dag pa'i sgra dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byor pa dang / rmongs pa dang / 'byed pa dang / 'phags pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par ni sna tshogs pa dang / sbyor ba dang / gtor ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / ring ba dang / dag pa'i sgra dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byor pa dang / rmongs pa dang / 'byed pa dang / 'phags pa dang /
translated: The various, the application, the scattered, the frightened, the distant, the pure sound, the dispute, the wealth, the confused, the divided, the noble,

original: ngan pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / ma mthong ba dang / 'khrul pa dang / nyams pa dang / gzigs pa dang / bgrod pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: ngan pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / ma mthong ba dang / 'khrul pa dang / nyams pa dang / gzigs pa dang / bgrod pa rnams la'o //
translated: the bad, the agitated, the unseen, the mistaken, the fallen, the seen, and the traversed.

original: rnam par zhes pa'i nye bar sgyur ba ni don bco brgyad po de rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: rnam par zhes pa'i nye bar sgyur ba ni don bco brgyad po de rnams la 'jug go //
translated: The suffix -vi- is used for these eighteen meanings.

original: sna tshogs la rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sbyor ba la rnam par sbyor ba dang / gtor ba la rnam pa gtor ba dang / 'jigs pa la rnam par 'jigs pa dang / ring ba la rnam par ring ba dang / dag pa'i sgra la rnam par dag pa'i sgra dang /

translated: Various means of various kinds. Application means application. Scattered means scattered. Frightened means frightened. Distant means distant. Pure sound means pure sound.

original: rtsod pa la rnam par rtsod pa dang / 'byor pa la rnam par 'byor pa dang / rmongs pa la rnam par rmongs pa dang / 'byed pa la rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'phags pa la rnam par 'phags pa dang / ngan pa la rnam par ngan pa dang /
analyzed: rtsod pa la rnam par rtsod pa dang / 'byor pa la rnam par 'byor pa dang / rmongs pa la rnam par rmongs pa dang / 'byed pa la rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'phags pa la rnam par 'phags pa dang / ngan pa la rnam par ngan pa dang /
translated: noble, noble;üîΩevil, evil;üîΩdisturbance, disturbance;

original: 'khrugs pa la rnam par 'khrugs pa dang / ma mthong ba la rnam @32a * //
analyzed: 'khrugs pa la rnam par 'khrugs pa dang / ma mthong ba la rnam @32a * //
translated: non-seeing, non-seeing;üîΩerror, error;üîΩdeficiency, deficiency;üîΩseeing, seeing;

original: bar ma mthong ba dang / 'khrul pa la rnam par 'khrul pa dang / nyams pa la rnam par nyams pa dang / gzigs pa la rnam par gzigs pa dang / bgrod pa la rnam par bgrod pa'o //
analyzed: bar ma mthong ba dang / 'khrul pa la rnam par 'khrul pa dang / nyams pa la rnam par nyams pa dang / gzigs pa la rnam par gzigs pa dang / bgrod pa la rnam par bgrod pa'o //
translated: crossing, crossing.

original: legs par ni thob pa dang / zhen pa dang / bcings pa dang / g-yo ba dang / gsungs pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / grags pa dang / g-yo sgyu dang / 'tshe ba dang / rtsom pa byed pa dang / 'phyang ba dang /

translated: Obtaining, attachment, bondage, movement, speaking, embracing, fame, deceit, harm, undertaking, hanging down,

original: gnas pa dang / ma bskal pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / mgron du gnyer ba dang / dga' ba dang / 'chad pa dang / sbyin pa dang / yid 'byung ba dang / dag byed dang / stobs 'gyed dang / yid la sems pa dang /
